channel.title: Tools & Utilities on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Tools & Utilities on ZooBerry

item.title: langZA01.dll
item.description: LangZA01.dll consolidates and replaces 31 individual dll files, offering updates and simplifying the main directory for Zoo Tycoon 1.

item.title: langZA02.dll
item.description: LangZA02.dll consolidates and replaces 18 individual dll files for buildings by Mark Bell, Devona, JparkZT, and Tazluvruk, available at Zoo Admin.

item.title: LangZA03.dll
item.description: LangZA03.dll consolidates and replaces several dll files, updating building messages and resolving conflicts for Zoo Admin releases up to January 2020.

item.title: Tools & Utilities
item.description: Language files, tools, and other utilities to help you mod Zoo Tycoon 1.

item.title: LANG-ZBorsato.dll
item.description: A language file for Zoo Tycoon 1 that adds new text strings to the game. This file is required for some mods to work properly.

item.title: ui99
item.description: Adds new location graphics and configurations to Zoo Tycoon 1.
